description: Ultimate talents you may only know one.
name: constitution

talents.info_text: Your body hardens and recovers quickly. When pushed below 30% life, you instantly restore 40% of your total life.
talents.name: Draconic Body
require: Level 30, Con 50; Be close to the draconic world

talents.info_text:
When a single blow deals more than 15% of your total life, a torrent of blood gushes from your body, creating a bloody tidal wave for 4 turns that deals 130, 175, 250, 325, 400 blight damage, heals you for 50% of the damage done, and knocks foes back.

The damage increases with your Constitution.
talents.name: Bloodspring
require: Level 30, Con 50; Have let Melinda be sacrificed

talents.info_text: Your block now lasts 1 more turn and does not end when hit.
talents.name: Eternal Guard
require: Level 30, Con 50; Know the Block talent

talents.info_text: While this talent is active, you dig deep into your stamina reserves, allowing you to move without taking a turn. However, this costs 12 stamina for each tile that you cross.
talents.name: Never Stop Running
require: Level 30, Con 50; Know at least 20 levels of stamina-using talents

talents.info_text:
You know how to protect yourself with the deepest shadows. As long as you stand on an unlit tile you gain 30, 30, 30, 37, 50 armour, 50% armour hardiness and 20% evasion.

Any time you deal darkness damage, you will unlight both the target tile and yours.

The armor bonus scales with your Constitution.
talents.name: Armour of Shadows
require: Level 30, Con 50; Have dealt over 50000 darkness damage

talents.info_text: Your back is as hard as stone. Each time that you are affected by a physical effect, your body hardens, making you immune to all other physical effects for 5 turns.
talents.name: Spine of the World
require: Level 30, Con 50

talents.info_text:
Fungal spores have colonized your blood, so that each time you use an infusion you store 25, 55, 107, 158, 210 fungal power.

You may use this prodigy to release the power as a heal (never more than than 100, 136, 184, 220, 250 life) and remove up to 10 detrimental magical effects.

Fungal power lasts for up to 6 turns, losing the greater of 10 potency or 10% of its power each turn.

The amount of fungal power produced and the maximum heal possible increase with your Constitution and maximum life.
talents.name: Fungal Blood
require: Level 30, Con 50; Be able to use infusions

talents.info_text:
Thanks to your newfound knowledge of corruption, you've learned some tricks for toughening your body… but only if you are healthy enough to withstand the strain from the changes.

Improves your life by 250, your defense by 3, 8, 16, 25, 33, your armour by 2, 7, 14, 21, 28, your armour hardiness by 20% and your saves by 3, 8, 16, 25, 33 as your natural toughness and reflexes are pushed beyond their normal limits.

Your saves armour and defense will improve with your Constitution.
talents.name: Corrupted Shell
require: Level 30, Con 50; Have received at least 7500 blight damage and destroyed Zigur with the Grand Corruptor.

talents.info_text:
When your life dips below 50% of your total life an automated process turns some of your lower skin layers (or other internal organs) into a thick metallic layer for 6 turns.

While the effect lasts all damage done to you is reduced by a flat amount equal to 100% of your Constitution.

This effect can only trigger once every 10 turns.
talents.name: Subcutaneous Metallisation
require: Level 30, Con 50, Talent Thick Skin (5)

description: Ultimate talents you may only know one.
name: cunning

talents.info_text:
When moving over 800% speed for at least 3 steps in the same direction, you become so fast you can blink through obstacles as if they were not there.

While moving this fast you have 50% chances to fully ignore an attack by displacing yourself (this may only happen once per turn).

Changing direction will break the effect.
talents.name: Fast As Lightning
require: Level 30, Cun 50

talents.info_text:
You are full of tricks and surprises; your Antimagic Shield can absorb 10%, 20%, 32%, 42%, 50% more damage.

The increase scales with your Cunning.
talents.name: Tricky Defenses
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Antimagic

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with a malevolent aura.

Any acid damage you do has a 20% chance to apply a lasting acid that deals 6%, 15%, 25%, 33%, 39% of the initial damage for 5 turns and reduces accuracy by 5, 12, 25, 37, 50.

Any blight damage you do has a 20% chance to cause a random disease that deals 6%, 15%, 25%, 33%, 39% of the initial damage for 5 turns and reduces a stat by 3, 8, 16, 25, 33.

Any darkness damage you do has a 20% chance to blind the target for 5 turns.

Any temporal damage you do has a 20% chance to slow (30%) the target for 5 turns.

Any mind damage you do has a 20% chance to confuse (20%) the target for 5 turns.

This only triggers for hits over 150 damage.

The damage values increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Endless Woes
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Have dealt over 50000 acid, blight, darkness, mind or temporal damage

talents.info_text: You have obtained the three parts of the Staff of Telos and studied them carefully. You believe that you can merge them back into a single highly potent staff.
talents.name: Secrets of Telos
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Possess Telos Top Half, Telos Bottom Half, and Telos Staff Crystal

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with an elemental aura. When you deal a critical hit with an element, you have a chance to trigger a special effect.

Arcane damage has a 30% chance to increase your spellcasting speed by 20% for 5 turns.

Fire damage has a 30% chance to cleanse all physical or magical detrimental effects on you.

Cold damage has a 30% chance to turn your skin into ice for 5 turns, reducing physical damage taken by 30%, increasing armor by 20, 26, 35, 42, 50, and dealing 100 ice damage to attackers.

Lightning damage has a 30% chance to transform you into pure lightning for 5 turns; any damage will displace you to an adjacent tile and ignore the damage (can only happen once per turn).

Light damage has a 30% chance to create a barrier around you, absorbing 120, 150, 200, 250, 300 damage for 5 turns.

Nature damage has a 30% chance to harden your skin, preventing the application of any magical detrimental effects for 5 turns.

The Cold and Light effects scale with your Cunning.

These effects only trigger for hits over 4, 40, 100, 160, 200 damage (based on your level).
talents.name: Elemental Surge
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Have dealt over 50000 arcane, fire, cold, lightning, light or nature damage

talents.info_text:
All spell criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random spell talent by 1.

All physical criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random technique or cunning talent by 2.

All mind criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random wild gift/psionic/afflicted talent by 2.

All steamtech criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random steamtech talent by 1.

This can only happen once per turn, and cannot affect the talent that triggers it.
talents.name: Eye of the Tiger
require: Level 30, Cun 50

talents.info_text:
Learn a new talent category from one of the below at 0.9 mastery, unlocked. Group 1 categories are available to anyone; Group 2 are available only to people without any spells or runes, and Group 3 are not available to followers of Zigur.

GROUP 1:

  • Technique / Conditioning
  • Cunning / Survival

GROUP 2:

  • Technique / Mobility
  • Technique / Field Control
  • Wild Gift / Call of the Wild
  • Wild Gift / Mindstar Mastery
  • Psionic / Dreaming

GROUP 3:

  • Spell / Divination
  • Spell / Staff Combat
  • Spell / Stone Alchemy
  • Celestial / Chants
  • Celestial / Light
  • Chronomancy / Chronomancy
talents.name: Worldly Knowledge
require: Level 30, Cun 50

talents.info_text:
You have friends in low places and have learned some underhanded tricks.

Gain 0.2 Category Mastery to the Cunning/Stealth Category (or unlock it, if you have the tree and it is locked), and either gain +0.1 to the Cunning/Scoundrel category or learn and unlock the category at 0.9 if you lack it.

Additionally, all of your damage penalties from invisibility are permanently halved.
talents.name: Tricks of the Trade
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Have sided with the Assassin Lord

talents.info_text:
Set up some cunning contingency plans in case of death.

If you die you will have the option to raise back from the dead once, but at the cost of becoming a ghoul or a skeleton, at random.

When rising this way you will lose access to your racial tree, if any, get refunded for half the points you spent in it and gain access to the ghoul or skeleton racial tree.

As undead are not able to use infusions you will lose any that you may have upon turning.
talents.name: Rak'Shor's Cunning
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Skeleton and Ghoul unlocked and not already undead.

description: Ultimate talents you may only know one.
name: dexterity

talents.info_text:
You are used to a crowded party:

  • you can swap places with friendly creatures in just one tenth of a turn as a passive effect.
  • you can never damage your friends or neutral creatures while this talent is active.
  • you love being surrounded by friends; for each friendly creature in sight you gain +10 to all saves and +3% to global speed (max 15%)
  • every party member is also automatically granted Through The Crowd
talents.name: Through The Crowd
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have had at least 6 party members at the same time

talents.info_text:
You have very agile hands; swapping equipment sets (default q key) takes no time, nor does equipping/unequipping items.

The free item switch may only happen once per turn.

The cooldown for equipping activatable equipment is removed.
talents.name: Swift Hands
require: Level 30, Dex 50

talents.info_text: You spin madly, generating a sharp gust of wind with your weapons that deals 320% weapon damage to all targets within radius 4 and disarms them for 4 turns.
talents.name: Windblade
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have dealt over 50000 damage with dual wielded weapons

talents.info_text:
You are attuned with Nature, and she helps you in your fight against the arcane forces.

You gain 20% permanent global speed, 10% cooldowns reduction and do not trigger pressure traps.
talents.name: Windtouched Speed
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Know at least 20 talent levels of equilibrium-using talents

talents.info_text:
You accurately jump to the target and deal 200% weapon damage to all foes within radius 1 on impact as well as dazing them for 3 turns.

When you jump you free yourself from any stun, daze and pinning effects.
talents.name: Giant Leap
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have dealt over 50000 damage with any weapon or unarmed

talents.info_text: You are very crafty. You can now also embed gems into helms and belts.
talents.name: Crafty Hands
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Know Imbue Item to level 5

talents.info_text:
You have learned to take a few hits when needed and can flow with the tide of battle.

So long as you can move, you find a way to dodge, evade, deflect or otherwise reduce physical damage against you by 2%, 6%, 10%, 12%, 15%.

Once per turn, when you get hit by a melee or archery attack you move back one tile for free and gain 200% movement speed for a turn.

The damage avoidance scales with your Dexterity and applies after resistances.
talents.name: Roll With It
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have been knocked around at least 50 times

talents.info_text:
You fire a shot straight at your enemy's vital areas, wounding them terribly.

Enemies hit by this shot will take 450% weapon damage and will be stunned and crippled (losing 50% physical, magical and mental attack speeds) for five turns due to the devastating impact of the shot.

The stun and cripple chances increase with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Vital Shot
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have dealt over 50000 damage with ranged weapons

talents.info_text:
A small automatic detection system is always looking for incoming projectiles, when one is about to hit you it injects drugs into your system to boost your reactivity, granting you a free turn.

This effect can not happen more than once every 5 turns.
talents.name: Automated Reflex System
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have gained the Matrix Style achievement with this or any previous character for the current difficulty & permadeath settings.

description: Ultimate talents you may only know one.
name: magic

talents.info_text: By infusing your shield with raw magic, your block can now block any damage type.
talents.name: Spectral Shield
require: Level 30, Mag 50; Know the Block talent, have cast 100 spells, and have a block value over 200

talents.info_text:
You manifest a thin layer of aether all around you. Any attack passing through it will check arcane resistance instead of the incoming damage resistance.

In effect, all of your resistances are equal to 66% of your arcane resistance, which is increased by 20% (and cap increased by 10%).
talents.name: Aether Permeation
require: Level 30, Mag 50; Have at least 25% arcane damage reduction and have been exposed to the void of space

talents.info_text:
Your study of arcane forces has let you develop a new way of applying your aptitude for trapping and poisons.

You learn the following talents:

Vulnerability Poison

Whenever you apply Deadly Poison, you also apply an unresistable magical poison dealing 20, 26, 35, 43, 50 arcane damage (based on your Magic) each turn. This poison reduces all damage resistance by 10% and poison immunity by 50%.

Gravitic Trap

Lay a trap that creates a radius 5 gravitic anomaly when triggered by foes approaching within range 1. Each turn, the anomaly deals 20, 31, 43, 52, 60 temporal damage (based on your Magic) to foes whle pulling them towards its center (chance increases with your combat accuracy or spell power, whichever is higher).

Each anomaly lasts 2 turns (up to the amount of time since the last anomaly dissipated, based on your Trap Mastery skill).

The trap may trigger more than once, but requires at least 2 turns to recharge between activations.

This design does not require advanced preparation to use.

You also permanently gain 20 Spell Save.
talents.name: Mystical Cunning
require: Level 30, Mag 50; Know how to either prepare traps or apply poisons

talents.info_text:
You have learned to harness your latent arcane powers, channeling them through your weapon.

This has the following effects:

Equipped weapons are treated as having an additional 50% Magic modifier;

Your raw Physical Power is increased by 100% of your raw Spellpower;

Your physical critical chance is increased by 25% of your bonus spell critical chance.
talents.name: Arcane Might
require: Level 30, Mag 50

talents.info_text:
You can wrap temporal threads around you, assuming the form of a telugoroth for 10 turns.

While in this form you gain pinning, bleeding, blindness and stun immunity, 30% temporal resistance, your temporal damage bonus is set to your current highest damage bonus + 30%, 50% of the damage you deal becomes temporal, and you gain 20% temporal resistance penetration.

You also are able to cast anomalies: Anomaly Rearrange, Anomaly Temporal Storm, Anomaly Flawed Design, Anomaly Gravity Pull and Anomaly Wormhole.
talents.name: Temporal Form
require: Level 30, Mag 50; Have cast over 1000 spells and visited a zone outside of time

talents.info_text:
You infuse blighted energies into all of your summons, granting them a new talent (at talent level 1, 1, 2, 3, 3):

  • War Hound: Curse of Defenselessness
  • Jelly: Vimsense
  • Minotaur: Life Tap
  • Golem: Bone Spear
  • Alchemy Golems: Corrupted Strength (level 3) and the Reaving Combat tree
  • Ritch: Drain
  • Hydra: Blood Spray
  • Rimebark: Poison Storm
  • Fire Drake: Darkfire
  • Turtle: Curse of Impotence
  • Spider: Corrosive Worm
  • Skeletons: Bone Grab or Bone Spear
  • Bone Giants: Bone Shield
  • Ghouls: Blood Lock
  • Ghoul Rot ghoul: Rend
  • Vampires / Liches: Darkfire
  • Ghosts / Wights: Blood Boil
  • Shadows: Empathic Hex
  • Thought-Forms: Flame of Urh'Rok
  • Treants: Corrosive Worm
  • Yeek Wayists: Dark Portal
  • Bloated Oozes: Bone Shield (level 1, 1, 2, 2, 2)
  • Mucus Oozes: Virulent Disease
  • Temporal Hounds: Elemental Discord

Your necrotic minions and wild-summons get a bonus to Magic equal to yours.

The talent levels increase with your level, and other race- or object-based summons may also be affected.
talents.name: Blighted Summoning
require: Level 30, Mag 50; Have summoned at least 100 creatures affected by this talent. The alchemist golem counts as 100.

talents.info_text:
You can now control the recent past. Upon using this prodigy you gain a temporal effect for 20 turns.

While this effect holds you can use the prodigy again to rewrite history.

This prodigy splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.
talents.name: Revisionist History
require: Level 30, Mag 50; Have time-travelled at least once

talents.info_text:
Your inner flame is strong. Each time that you receive a blow that would kill you, your body is wreathed in flames.

The flames will cauterize the wound, fully absorbing all damage done this turn, but they will continue to burn for 8 turns.

Each turn 10% of the damage absorbed will be dealt by the flames. This will bypass resistance and affinity.

Warning: this has a cooldown.
talents.name: Cauterize
require: Level 30, Mag 50; Have received at least 7500 fire damage and have cast at least 1000 spells

talents.info_text:
You create an Arcane Amplification Drone at the selected location for 3 turns.

When you cast a spell that damages the drone it will ripple the damage as 160% arcane damage of the initial hit in radius 4.
talents.name: Arcane Amplification Drone
require: Level 30, Mag 50; Have gained the Tales of the Spellblaze achievement with this or any previous character for the current difficulty & permadeath settings.

description: Ultimate talents you may only know one.
name: other

talents.info_text: Rewrite the recent past to go back to when you cast Revisionist History.
talents.name: Unfold History

description: Ultimate talents you may only know one.
name: strength

talents.info_text: Each time that you make a melee attack you have a 60% chance to execute an additional unarmed strike.
talents.name: Flexible Combat
require: Level 30, Str 50

talents.info_text:
You deal a massive blow to your foe, smashing it for 350% weapon damage and knocking it back 6 tiles.

All foes in its path will be knocked to the side and stunned for 3 turns.

For each size category over 'big' you gain an additional +80% weapon damage.
talents.name: You Shall Be My Weapon!
require: Level 30, Str 50; Be of size category 'big' or larger. This is also required to use it.

talents.info_text:
You deal a massive blow to your foe, smashing it for 150% weapon damage and knocking it back 4 tiles (ignoring knockback resistance or physical save).

If the knockback makes it hit a wall, it will smash down the wall, deal an additional 350% weapon damage and apply the Counterstrike effect.
talents.name: Massive Blow
require: Level 30, Str 50; Have dug at least 30 walls/trees/etc. and have dealt over 50000 damage with two-handed weapons

talents.info_text:
When you rush, the creature you rush to is marked. If you kill it in the next two turns then your rush cooldown is reset.

Each time that this effect triggers you gain a stacking +20% damage buff, up to 100%.

Rush now only costs 2 stamina.
talents.name: Steamroller
require: Level 30, Str 50; Know the Rush talent

talents.info_text:
For 6 turns you gain the mass and power of a star, drawing all creatures within radius 5 toward you and dealing 22, 31, 45, 59, 73 fire, 22, 31, 45, 59, 73 light and 22, 31, 45, 59, 73 physical damage to all foes.

Foes closer to you take up to 150% damage.

The damage will increase with your Strength.
talents.name: Irresistible Sun
require: Level 30, Str 50; Have dealt over 50000 light or fire damage

talents.info_text:
Your strength is legendary; fatigue and physical exertion mean nothing to you.

Your fatigue is permanently set to 0, carrying capacity increased by 500, and strength increased by 50 and you gain a size category.
talents.name: I Can Carry The World!
require: Level 30, Str 50; Be able to use massive armours

talents.info_text:
You have sided with Slasul and helped him vanquish Ukllmswwik. You are now able to breathe underwater with ease.

You have also learned to use tridents and other exotic weapons easily (talent level 1, 1, 3, 4, 5 of Exotic Weapon Mastery), and can Spit Poison (talent level 1, 1, 3, 4, 5) as nagas do. These are bonus talent levels that increase with your character level.

In addition, should Slasul still live, he may have a further reward for you as thanks…
talents.name: Legacy of the Naloren
require: Level 30, Str 50; Have sided with Slasul and killed Ukllmswwik

talents.info_text:
A strong body is key to a strong mind, and a strong mind can be powerful enough to make a strong body.

This prodigy grants a Mindpower bonus equal to 60% of your Strength.

Additionally, you treat all weapons as having an additional 40% Willpower modifier.
talents.name: Superpower
require: Level 30, Str 50

talents.info_text: When you deal a critical hit your embedded system activates, increasing all your primary stats except Strength by 50% of your Strength for 6 turn.
talents.name: Pain Enhancement System
require: Level 30, Str 50; Earned the achievement 'Size Matters' on this character.

description: Ultimate talents you may only know one.
name: willpower

talents.info_text:
Your body is like that of a drake, easily resisting detrimental effects.

For 5 turns, no detrimental effects may target you.
talents.name: Draconic Will
require: Level 30, Wil 50; Be close to the draconic world

talents.info_text:
When casting damaging spells or mind attacks, the release of your willpower can call forth a meteor to crash down near your foes.

The affected area is turned into lava for 8 turns, and the crash itself will deal 75, 113, 175, 238, 300 fire and 75, 113, 175, 238, 300 physical damage.

The meteor also stuns affected creatures for 3 turns. The damage scales with your Spellpower or Mindpower.
talents.name: Meteoric Crash
require: Level 30, Wil 50; Have witnessed a meteoric crash

talents.info_text: Garkul's spirit is with you. You now deal 1000% more damage to constructs and 20% more damage to humanoids and giants.
talents.name: Garkul's Revenge
require: Level 30, Wil 50; Possess and wear two of Garkul's artifacts and know all about Garkul's life

talents.info_text:
You focus your mind on the task at hand, regardless of how dire the situation is.

For 5 turns, none of your talents use any resources.
talents.name: Hidden Resources
require: Level 30, Wil 50; Have been close to death(killed a foe while below 1 HP)

talents.info_text: Every day is your lucky day! You gain a permanent +40 luck bonus and 10% to move out of the way of every attack.
talents.name: Lucky Day
require: Level 30, Wil 50; Be lucky already (at least +5 luck)

talents.info_text:
Your will is so strong that you simply ignore mental effects used against you.

Warning: this has a cooldown.
talents.name: Unbreakable Will
require: Level 30, Wil 50

talents.info_text:
Your will is a shield against assaults from crazed arcane users.

Each time that you take damage from a spell, you punish the spellcaster with 40, 70, 120, 170, 220 mind damage.

Also, they will suffer a 35% spell failure chance (with duration equal to the cooldown of the spell they used on you).

Note: this talent has a cooldown.
talents.name: Spell Feedback
require: Level 30, Wil 50; Antimagic

talents.info_text:
Transcend the physical and rule over all with an iron will!

While this sustain is active, 33% of your damage is converted into mind damage.

Additionally, you gain +30% mind resistance penetration, and +10% mind damage.
talents.name: Mental Tyranny
require: Level 30, Wil 50; Have dealt over 50000 mind damage

talents.info_text:
Activate a special focusing device that extends all your ranged spells and psionic powers range by 3 (only works on those with range 2 or more and up to 10 max).

The use of this device is very strenuous, increasing fatigue by 20% while active.
talents.name: Range Amplification Device
require: Level 30, Wil 50; Have a light radius of 10 or more
